plot: Jeremy tests the BMW 535d. Richard goes to Iceland to see whether is it possible to drive over a lake. James travels to Dubai to test the Bentley Continental Flying Spur. The boys test various off-road toys (buggies, ATV quad bikes, hover-crafts, etc.) to see which is the most fun. Big Brother host Davina McCall and Mark Webber are the Stars In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Caboose

Jeremy compares the BMW 535d diesel to its petrol variant, and it becomes the first diesel-powered car driven by The Stig on a lap of the test track. Richard returns to Iceland, where he races a modified off-road vehicle against a snowmobile across a lake. James goes to Dubai to test the Bentley Continental Flying Spur. Big Brother host Davina McCall and Mark Webber are the Stars In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
